content.heroIntro: EDIFICIO NEPTUNO II represents a landmark development by COSTA BLANCA BOLU3, perfectly positioned in the vibrant Centro district of Torrevieja. This exclusive penthouse development offers sophisticated coastal living at exceptional value, with prices starting from just €272,000—approximately 45% less than comparable properties on Costa Blanca North. The project delivers modern architecture combined with premium finishes, featuring 1-bedroom penthouses with 2 bathrooms across 69m² of thoughtfully designed living space. With completion scheduled for January 1, 2027, EDIFICIO NEPTUNO II provides an outstanding investment opportunity in Spain's largest expat community, where English is widely spoken and international amenities are abundant. The development captures the essence of Mediterranean lifestyle while maintaining accessibility to world-class healthcare, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and championship golf courses within minutes.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the beating heart of this dynamic coastal city, renowned as Spain's largest expat community with English spoken everywhere. This prime location combines authentic Spanish charm with cosmopolitan convenience, offering residents an unparalleled lifestyle. The area provides immediate access to Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja for comprehensive 24-hour public healthcare, the award-winning Playa del Cura with its Blue Flag certification for pristine waters, and excellent shopping facilities including Mercadona, Carrefour, and Lidl. Residents enjoy convenient connections to championship golf courses like Villamartín just 15 minutes away, combined with thriving restaurant scenes, cultural attractions, and year-round sunny weather. Centro Torrevieja delivers the perfect balance of modern amenities and relaxed Mediterranean living.
